message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,150,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,075,000. What do you think?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the value of this product. How about we settle at $1,110,000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $1,075,000 is a more reasonable price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so how about we try $1,087,500?
